content.question: Many medium-sized metropolitan areas such as Minneapolis-Saint Paul, Minnesota, or Charlotte, North Carolina, have added light-rail train systems to their public-transit networks. Which of the following best explains the goals of light-rail projects?

choices.label: Reduce highway accident numbers due to unsafe driving and outdated, less-safe vehicles
Protect wetlands and local lakes from water pollution caused by industrial waste discharge
Reduce the ecological footprint of cities and reduce the air pollution created by vehicle exhaust
Redevelop urban brownfields and promote farmland protection policies that reduce urban sprawl
Plan for sustainable residential zoning and establish an urban-growth boundary around cities

content.answer: Reduce the ecological footprint of cities and reduce the air pollution created by vehicle exhaust
